roleMapping.fury: Project Director - Coordinates frontend/backend integration, manages sprint priorities
roleMapping.ironman: System Architect - Designs API contracts, data models, tech stack selection, code review
roleMapping.spiderman: Frontend Developer - React/Vue/Angular components, responsive design, accessibility, state management
roleMapping.thor: Backend Developer - REST/GraphQL APIs, database design, server infrastructure, authentication
roleMapping.cap: Product Owner - User value alignment, feature prioritization, scope management, acceptance criteria
roleMapping.thanos: QA Lead - E2E testing, security audit, performance benchmarks, cross-browser testing
